title: The Barstool Fund
description:
Kirk Minihane takes a break from his vacation to announce his own special contribution to the Barstool Fund. Now, the hunt is on to see who will win the Minifan Golden Ticket. If you want a chance to win the ticket -- and all the benefits it comes with -- you must donate at least $30 to the Barstool Fund. Here: https://www.barstoolsports.com/the-barstool-fund


You can find every episode of this show on Apple Podcasts, Spotify or YouTube. Prime Members can listen ad-free on Amazon Music. For more, visit barstool.link/kminshow
dc:creator: Barstool Sports
